name: Stay Humble Relax Hood
description: Stay Humble Relax Hood Holy Canopy is a stylish and comfortable hoodie designed for everyday wear. Made from high-quality materials, it features a relaxed fit and a unique design that stands out.
frabric_details: Fit: Relaxed for comfort, drop shoulder for a casual silhouette
Fabric: Mid-weight 320GSM fleece, 80% cotton, 20% recycled polyester (CVC blend)
Feel: Soft-touch interior, warm and durable with structure
Details: Pullover hood, kangaroo pocket, self-fabric lined hood, no drawcord, sleeve cuff ribbin
Preshrunk: Minimised shrinkage for lasting shape and fit
